original_text:
Meonothai was the father of Ophrah.
Seraiah was the father of Joab,
the father of Ge Harashim. It was called this because its people were skilled workers.
korean_text: 므오노대는 오브라를 낳고 스라야는 요압을 낳았으니 요압은 게하라심의 조상이라 그들은 공장이었더라

sentences.original_text: Meonothai was the father of Ophrah
Seraiah was the father of Joab
because its people were skilled workers
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳의 사람들이 기술이 뛰어난 장인들이었기 때문이다
